Code

Secure_Socket's code can be found in its public repository

Key

Class whose main purpose is to manage the AES key once generated, as well as its parameters.

Functions
Key
Key(
CryptoPP::SecByteBlock IV,
CryptoPP::SecByteBlock key,
int key_len = 32
)

Default constructor to create the Key object.

Parameters
IV
CryptoPP::SecByteBlock

The Initialization Vector (IV).

key
CryptoPP::SecByteBlock

The key itself.

key_len
int

Key's length. Default value: 32.

Returns

Reference (pointer) to the Key object.

get_IV
CryptoPP::SecByteBlock get_IV()

Returns the Initalization Vector (IV).

Returns

IV_

get_key
CryptoPP::SecByteBlock get_key()

Returns the key itself.

Returns

key_

get_key_len
int get_key_len()

Returns key's length.

Returns

key_len_
